nodes.text: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back - Official Collectors Edition

Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back: Official Collectors Edition was a magazine published in 1980 by Paradise Press to promote the release of Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. It included information regarding the characters, creatures and machines of the movie, as well as the movie's production, profiles of the movie's production staff and a plot synopsis, which notably omitted the movie's famous revelation.
